task.title: Smoking on Campus
task.shortdesc: Despite its efforts to ban smoking altogether, Virginia Tech is a relatively cigarette-friendly campus.

step.cmd: If you are of legal age, find a convenient place that is at least 25 feet away from any building entryways.

step.info: Be courteous by making sure the smoke from your cigarette isn't in other's faces.

step.cmd: If there is no official cigarette disposing station nearby, make sure the flame is all the way out before throwing it in the trash.
